name: mern-chat-app
description: What is MERN? - MongoDB     - Database management     - Cross platform, No SQL and document-oriented - Express JS     - Node JS framework     - Powerful Routing API     - Detailed Documentation     - High Performance     - Many third party plugins - React JS     - Frontend framework     - Reusable component     - Virtual DOM: keeps UI prerendered in memory     - Super fast - Node JS     - Javascript runtime build on Chrome's V8 Engine     - Scalable web server     - Node Package Manager
author: erick.jaucian
